name: sientate-a-la-mesa
description: Aplicacion para la gestión de reservas en restaurantes

scripts.start: npm run start:server && npm run start:client
scripts.start_build: npm run stop:manteinance && run start:server_build && npm run start:client_build
scripts.start:client: cd client/sientate-a-la-mesa  && nohup http-server dist/ -a 10.6.128.143 -p 8080 --silent & echo $! > .http-server-pid
scripts.start:client_build: cd client/sientate-a-la-mesa  && npm install && npm run build && nohup http-server dist/ -a 10.6.128.143 -p 8080 -silent & echo $! > .http-server-pid
scripts.start:server_build: cd server/ && npm install && npm run build && pm2 start dist/index.js
scripts.stop: npm run stop:server && npm run stop:client
scripts.stop:server: cd server && pm2 stop dist/index.js && pm2 delete dist/index.js
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:server: cd server/ && npm run startTest && npm run test
